nodes.bodyText: Are you sure that when the error methods are called, the object itself errors with the given message than listen to error from other things?

Yes, that's exactly what I was thinking about that name. In one of my enigma branches I have a Validatable class because I added a validation framework, which does something very similar as far this as I can see, but it has the slight difference in meaning that it doesn't create the errors itself. That might actually be a good name for this interface. Or ErrorReceiver as in my PR but I still think that name is also kinda meh, definitely better than Errable though, imo.
In fact Errable is the right name, as this object has the error when the error method is called. Imo error should be like errored instead
